title: Django Group By Date
short_description: As our day to day life in developing web application or other applications sometime we need data to be grouped by with some certain attribute(s). Its easy to do this by sql query but we need to go little deeper while we use Django ORM, specially for datetime field. It might possible to get the result by executing sql directly from the code. But its difficult to manage and not the pythonic way of doing development. To solve this problem the below solution might be helpful for you.
